data.title: Tour de France / Skoda Commercial - Who knows this song?
data.meta_description: I just remembered this commercial. Back then, not even Skoda could tell me what song it is. The chord sequence is terrific and I´d really like to have...
data.text:
I just remembered this commercial. Back then, not even Skoda could tell me what song it is. The chord sequence is terrific and I´d really like to have it on an LP or CD. Can anybody shed some light?

http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EeYPMddC_2E

Sorry, I forgot that sometimes Google can be your best friend . The tune is called "Tomorrow" by Billinger & Marsman feat. Jasper Vergeer. Nobody knew that in 2005 / 2006. Unfortunately, it was exclusively produced for this film and it is not available commercially.
